Tunable.name: CAREGIVER_RELATIONSHIP_BIT
Tunable.description: The relationship bit between a Sim and their caregiver, e.g. between a parent and a toddler.

Tunable.name: DEFAULT_PET_TO_SIM_TRACK
Tunable.description: This is the default relationship track for pet to sim relationships

Tunable.name: DEFAULT_RELATIONSHIP_VALUE
Tunable.description: The default value for relationship track scores.

Tunable.name: DEFAULT_SHORT_TERM_CONTEXT_TRACK
Tunable.description: If no short-term context tracks exist for a relationship, use this default as the prevailing track.

Tunable.name: DELAY_UNTIL_RELATIONSHIP_IS_CULLED
Tunable.description: The amount of time, in sim minutes, that it takes before a relationship is culled once all of the tracks have reached convergence.

Tunable.name: ENGAGEMENT_RELATIONSHIP_BIT
Tunable.description: The relationship bit between two Sims who have been engaged.

Tunable.name: FEUD_TARGET
Tunable.description: A reference to the bit a Sim has with a Sim they are Feuding with.

Tunable.name: HAS_MET_RELATIONSHIP_BIT
Tunable.description: The relationship bit between two Sims that have met each other.

Tunable.name: MARRIAGE_RELATIONSHIP_BIT
Tunable.description: The marriage relationship bit. This tuning references the relationship bit signifying that the sim is a spouse to someone. Whenever this bit is added to a sim's relationship, it has the side effect of updating the spouse_sim_id on a sim's relationship tracker. If the bit goes away, the field is cleared.

Tunable.name: MAX_RELATIONSHIP_VALUE
Tunable.description: The maximum value any relationship can be.

TunableList.name: MEANINGFUL_RELATIONSHIP_BITS
TunableList.description: A set of relationship bits that represent a meaningful relationship.

Tunable.description: A relationship bit that signifies that this is a meaningful relationship.

Tunable.name: MIN_RELATIONSHIP_VALUE
Tunable.description: The minimum value any relationship can be.

Tunable.name: NEIGHBOR_GIVEN_KEY_RELATIONSHIP_BIT
Tunable.description: The relationship bit that signifies if you've given a key to someone.

Tunable.name: NEIGHBOR_RELATIONSHIP_BIT
Tunable.description: The relationship bit automatically applied to sims who live on the same street but in difference households.

Tunable.name: REL_INSPECTOR_TRACK
Tunable.description: This is the track that the rel inspector follows. Any bits that are apart of this track should NOT be marked visible unless you want them showing up in both places.

TunableList.name: SIGNIFICANT_OTHER_RELATIONSHIP_BITS
TunableList.description: A list of relationship bits that mark the relationship as being between significant others. Only one of these bits is required for the sims to be considered significant others.

Tunable.description: A relationship bit that signifies that a sim is a significant other to someone else.
